title: (Weds Full) We Share Brutally Honest Marriage Advice + Did Amy Customer Service Purposely Hang Up on Her?  + Lunchbox Does ‘Bloody Mary’ with The Haunted Doll
itunes:title: (Weds Full) We Share Brutally Honest Marriage Advice + Did Amy Customer Service Purposely Hang Up on Her?  + Lunchbox Does ‘Bloody Mary’ with The Haunted Doll
description:
Amy was on a lengthy phone call with customer service - she was trying to get logged into an account. Then somehow they got disconnected & Amy thinks he may have actually just hung up on her. We want to know…Customer service people - do you ever hang up on customers? And we get an update from Lunchbox and the haunted doll challenge.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
